name: ayursutra-backend
description: AWS Lambda backend for AyurSutra Guide - AI assistant, daily reports, and notifications

scripts.build: npm run build:assistant && npm run build:daily-report && npm run build:enqueue-reminders && npm run build:send-notifications
scripts.deploy: npm run build && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name ayursutra-assistant --zip-file fileb://dist/assistant.zip
